doc.after: Betances was also a medical doctor and surgeon in Puerto Rico and one of its first social hygienists He had established a successful surgery and ophthalmology practice Betances was also a diplomat public health administrator poet and novelist He served as representative and contact for Cuba and the Dominican Republic in Paris
